MEMBERSHIP
BENEFITS
Besides special events, unlimited entry into gardens
Reduced rates on special events
Subscription to electronic emails
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
Bok Tower
*
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
McKee Botanical Gardens
*
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
Heathcote Botanical Gardens
*
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
Polasek Museum and Scultpture Garden
*
1/2 prince reciprocal agreement with Naples Botanical Gardens
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
Cedar Lakes Woods & Gardens
1/2 price reciprocal agreement with
Imagine Museum
*A valid membership card must be presented. All reciprocal arrangements exclude special events, other discounts, groups or tours.
ANNUAL MEMBER PRICING until 9/30/25
Individual - $50 (1 named adult)
Individual plus 3 kids - $70 (1 named adult and up to 3 of their children ages 18 and younger.)
Two Named Adults - $75 (2 named adults)
Two Named Adults plus 3 kids- $95 (2 named adults and up to 3 of their children ages 18 and younger.)
Three Named Adults- $115.00 (3 named adults)
Three Named Adults plus 3 kids- $135.00 (3 named adults + up to three of their children ages 18 and younger)
Group/Business- $200 (2 named adults & up to six clients/guests per day. At least one named adult must be present when clients/guests enter.)
Extra card- $5 each
Online Memberships
All names of adults on the membership need to be listed. Each membership only comes with one card. If you would like an additional card it can be purchased for $5. Members must bring their
membership card
with them to be scanned along with a
photo ID
for entry.
Purchase membership online
HOW YOU RECEIVE THE MEMBERSHIP CARD WITH ONLINE PURCHASE
We process membership cards within two weeks (usually one) to the address indicated under "shipping information" that was filled out when the membership was purchased. Members must bring their
membership card
with them to be scanned along with a
photo ID
for entry.
CONVERT YOUR ADMISSION TO MEMBERSHIP
When you visit Kanapaha and you like what you see, consider applying the price of your admission (on non-special event days)  toward an annual membership to Kanapaha on the day of your visit. Simply go to the greetings desk and your admission can be directly converted to an annual membership. Only valid on the same day and in-person.
GIVE A GIFT OF MEMBERSHIP
Whether it be a birthday surprise or a holiday gift, share the beauty of Kanapaha with a gift membership with family and friends.
Membership Frequently Asked Questions
Additional Information
How does my member card work? Can I add more people to the account?
You will receive one (1) card per household for Individual, Named Adult or Business Memberships.  Members must bring their
membership card
with them to be scanned along with a
photo ID
for entry.
•	Please be prepared to present your membership card at the entrance along with a photo ID
•	The name on the ID must match the information on your membership account
•	Only the adult members are listed on membership cards
•	Your membership account can be upgraded to a higher level. The fee is the price difference for the level you are upgrading to, plus $5 for the necessary issuance of an updated card until you have reached the maximum alloteed membership level.
•	Added members expire the same time as the primary member’s account
•	You can purchase additional cards for $5 each
What if I lost my card?
There is a $5 replacement fee for lost cards
What if we want to bring other people outside of our membership?
Should you choose to bring additional guest (not covered by your membership) they can visit the greetings desk to purchase tickets. If you have an Individual Adult Membership or above, your guests come in with a $1 discount to the regular admission price. Remember, you have the opportunity to add individuals (up to Three Adult Level or Group/Business) at any time!
Can I put my membership on hold?
Memberships are for 12 continuous months and cannot be put on hold.
Can I change the name/names of adults on my membership?
Although adults can be added on to a membership using the procedures described above, once a person has been named on a membership, they cannot be changed/substituted to another person. Once the membership is up for renewal, it can be changed at that time.

Events
Camellia Show
Camellia Show
Camellia Show
January 3 & 4, 2026
This event features prize-winning camellias of all sizes, shapes, and colors. This show is geared toward educating the public about the care, culture, and appreciation of camellias. Camellias will be available for sale while supplies last! Regular admission price for non-members, which includes entry into the gardens and the show. Members who bring their membership card to be scanned have free entry to the show.
No solicitors allowed.
Bamboo Sale
Camellia Show
Camellia Show
Every winter, Kanapaha holds an Annual Winter Bamboo Sale. In January, Kanapaha issues a descriptive sales/availability listing of bamboos that are being offered during part of January on a dug-to-order basis.
MORE DETAILS
Spring Garden Festival
Fall Plant Sale & Orchid Show
Fall Plant Sale & Orchid Show
March 21 & 22,  2026
This is Gainesville's premier horticultural event. The Spring Garden Festival features 100 booths offering plants, landscape displays, garden accessories, arts and crafts, educational exhibits and, of course, foods. Also featured are live entertainment on Sunday.
Pets are not allowed at these festivals. No solicitors allowed.
MORE DETAILS
Fall Plant Sale & Orchid Show
Fall Plant Sale & Orchid Show
Fall Plant Sale & Orchid Show
October 25, 2025
Each October, Kanapaha Botanical Gardens holds an Open House & Fall Plant Sale, in conjunction with the Gainesville Orchid Society, inviting visitors to see the facility ADMISSION FREE. In addition to viewing the botanical gardens, approximately 50 booth will be set up selling a wide variety of plants. The American Orchid Society will have their annual American Orchid Society's judged show that will coincide with the Fall Plant Sale and will take place inside Kanapaha's entrance building.
Pets are not allowed at these festivals. No solicitors allowed.
